title: 2XU Women's Comp Tri Singlet
features: True mechanical flatlock stitching allows the garment to flow with your movement while reducing chafe
description: A versatile, form flattering Tri Singlet to compliment the 2XU Comp Tri Short. SBR SKIN X fabric ensures a quick drying, breathable result out of the water, while flatlock seams, a streamline cut and LYCRA fiber enhance comfort. SENSOR MESH X provides ventilation for all race conditions. SBR SKIN X is engineered from powerful 70D elastane yarn with heightened compressive properties to support the wearer for greater endurance and higher power output. Built-in shelf bra for versatility and performance.
